header.title: Srenova Eligibility Check
header.description: Let's find out if our property solutions are right for you. Answer a few simple questions to determine your eligibility.

feedback.eligible: Based on your answers, Srenova might be a great for for you. In the next step we'll ask for your name and email address, and ask if you want to start with an application to sell your home the Srneova way. You're in control of the process, and nothing is binding at this stage — it's an opportunity to learn more about us, and for us to learn about you and your home.
feedback.ineligible: Based on your answers, Srenova might not be suitable for you yet. But let's stay connected as we may be a great fit in the future.
feedback.ineligibleConfirmed: Thank you for confirming. While Srenova might not be suitable now, feel free to stay in touch for future updates or discuss potential alternatives.

confirmDialog.title: Important Eligibility Information
confirmDialog.description: Based on your selection, you may not be eligible for our services.

content.country: Our services are currently only fully available in the United Kingdom with limited services in some EU countries.
content.ownership: Our services require property ownership as they are specifically designed for homeowners.
content.ageUnder60: Our services are specifically designed for individuals aged 60 and above.
content.age75plus: Our standard services are typically designed for individuals between 60-74 years of age. However, we have specialized options for seniors in your age group that our advisors can discuss with you.
content.spouseAge: For jointly owned properties, our standard services typically require both owners to be 60 or older. However, we may have alternative options that our advisors can discuss with you.
content.inheritanceTopPriority: Our standard solutions may affect the inheritance value of your property. If preserving inheritance is your top priority, you may want to explore alternative options. We can still discuss specialized solutions that may better align with your inheritance goals.
content.discussOptionsNo: Understanding your options is a crucial part of making an informed decision. Without discussing your options with an advisor, we cannot ensure you'll have all the information needed to make the best choice for your situation.
